title: Application Complete
titleText: You have sent your application to the tribunal
pNo: The tribunal will consider all correspondence and let you know what happens next.

pYes.p1: You have sent a copy of your application to the respondent. They will have until
pYes.p2: If they do respond, they are expected to copy their response to you.
pYes.p3: You may be asked to supply further information. The tribunal will consider all correspondence and let you know what happens next.
